title: George Michael
summary: George Michael (born Georgios Kyriacos Panayiotou; 25 June 1963 â€“ 25 December 2016) was a British singer, songwriter and record producer. Known as a leading creative force in music production, songwriting, vocal performance and visual presentation,[2][3][4][5][6] he is regarded as one of the most significant cultural figures of the MTV era.[7][8][9]
